definitions.explanation_en: A surname, most notably associated with American actor and filmmaker Ben Affleck and his brother, actor Casey Affleck.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个姓氏，最著名的是指美国演员兼电影制作人本·阿弗莱克（Ben Affleck）及其弟弟、演员凯西·阿弗莱克（Casey Affleck）。
definitions.example_en: Ben Affleck won an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for Good Will Hunting.
definitions.example_cn: 本·阿弗莱克因《心灵捕手》获得奥斯卡最佳原创剧本奖。
